DataSourcePortable.Name: NOMEADA_CONTAS_TOTALIZADA
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) QTDEEMPNOMEADAS 
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS
WHERE CONTANOMEADA = 'S'
AND FILIAL IN (3,11,15,16,17)
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTDEEMPNOMEADAS" From="A" Path="QTDEEMPNOMEADAS" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
